src

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.Main

  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    Since:
    2024 this is a basic CLI turn-based fighting game. The player selects a weapon to use with various stats Enemies are chosen by random for the player to fight by shuffling their index in an array. Combat is simple turn based action where the goal is to get the enemies hp to 0 to win, if your hp is lowered to 0 however you will lose the match, various actions exist to perform. Such as attacking or guarding.

      Function which dictates plater choice, almost all basic stats regarding the enemy and player are taken as parameters for the function Choices are made using a Scanner to recieve input, depending on the String inputed various actions are performed.

      • main

      • attackMenuEnemy

        public static void attackMenuEnemy(int enemyATK,
                                   int enemyGuard,
                                   int enemyHP,
                                   int playerHP)
        Function which dicates enemy choices, takes in various parameters required for action, unlike the player all choices are random and it lacks a special option to use.
        Parameters:
        enemyATK - the damage the enemy deals.
        enemyGuard - the hp the enemy will regain from guarding.
        enemyHP - the hitpoints the current enemy has.
        playerHP - the hitpoints the player currently has.

      • attackMenuPlayer

        public static void attackMenuPlayer(java.lang.String currentWeapon,
                                    int playerATK,
                                    int playerSpecial,
                                    int playerGuard,
                                    int enemyHP,
                                    int playerHP)
        Function which dictates plater choice, almost all basic stats regarding the enemy and player are taken as parameters for the function Choices are made using a Scanner to recieve input, depending on the String inputed various actions are performed.
        Parameters:
        currentWeapon - the weapon the player has chosen
        playerATK - the damage the player deals
        playerSpecial - the special attack the player has
        playerGuard - the hp the player will regain from guarding
        enemyHP - the hitpoints the current enemy has
        playerHP - the hitpoints the player currently has

        Parameters:
        currentWeapon - the weapon the player has chosen.
